content: *delicate colorful flowers adorn this precious bib and bootie set shown in bernat handicrafter cotton bernat com * skill level intermediate **yarn requirements ** 2 colors 4 balls total bernat® handicrafter cotton solids 1 75 oz/50 g ombres 1 5 oz/42 5 g *or* lily® sugar n cream solids 2 5 oz/70 9 g ombres 2 oz/56 7 g main color mc ombre 2 balls contrast a pink 2 balls size 4 mm u s g or 6 crochet hook 3 buttons bib features 3 crocheted flowers button closure booties feature crocheted flower and buttoned straps for each foot link above is for the bernat pattern same pattern is also available in lily sugar n cream 1 1 https //www yarnspirations com/lily-sugarn-cream-pretty-flowers/scc0238-006024m html
